articles.author: KEN MORITSUGU, HUIZHONG WU
articles.title: China counters with tariffs on US products. It will also investigate Google. - The Associated Press
articles.description: China has announced retaliatory tariffs on select American imports and an antitrust investigation into Google, just minutes after a sweeping levy on Chinese products imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump took effect. This isn’t the first round of tit-for-tat…
articles.content: BEIJING (AP) China announced retaliatory tariffs on select American imports and an antitrust investigation into Google on Tuesday, just minutes after a sweeping levy on Chinese products imposed by U.… [+7690 chars]
